content: Lean 4 has type classes Min and Max for min and max, and LinearOrder extends these classes. In Lean 3, the fields max and min of a linear_order are auto-filled if none is provided, but that doesn't seem possible in Lean 4 (note: one cannot use fun a b => if a â‰¤ b then a else b for min because the ite requires a decidability assumption on the proposition, and this decidability is itself implemented in the LinearOrder structure. Of course, you could provide the decidable instance ahead of time, but this seems not preferable. See also mathlib4#783
(I solved this just by adding defaults for min and max in LinearOrder.)
